mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wms_tbl (wms_id, order_id, address,wms_status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{wmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wmsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select wms_id, order_id, address,wms_status, create_time, update_time from wms_tbl where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
